reviews.review: I've been playing this game for 10 years (on the Xbox 360) and I have never gotten sick of it. It's a great game to play with friends. It's fun to mess around, play campaigns, survival, and versus, sometimes with cheats too. The ambiance is what sets it apart from Left 4 Dead 2. This will always be my favorite game.
Juegazo para pasar el tiempo :3

El padre del mejor juego shooter cooperativo. Incluso tiene coop versus.

9/10, 10/10 es para Left 4 Dead 2
This game is a very good game.

I love Left4Dead 2 more then Left4Dead. Left4Dead is still an awesome video game. But Modding sometimes confusing, annoying, makes me angry on it. But when the mods work. It's a fun time. I would recommend getting Left4Dead 1 on discount price, not full-price.

Classic

I played the crap out of this game on Xbox 360 originally.  And that only had 5 levels...
Got the full 1000/1000 original gamerscore.  Pretty sure the last achievement was to literally not have anyone get hit by any special infected at any point for an entire campaign and I remember going to onto a forum and partying up with good players specifically with the intention of completing this achievement.  I also used to do speed runs of Blood Harvest on Expert Solo.  And there was a summer I spent every morning doing Blood Harvest with Brent and Frankie.  Good times.  Now everyone hates Left 4 Dead, so I hate them.
